data.title: Wilhelm Hottl
data.meta_description: Die geheime Front : Organisation, Personen und Aktionen des deutschen Geheimdienstes by Höttl, Wilhelm and a great selection of related books, art and collectibles available now at AbeBooks.com.
data.text:
Leinen. Condition: Gut. 21,5 cm 514 S. ; Leinen (Gebunden). Zustand: Gut gering gebräunt (Innen); Einband (Außen) hat leichte Gebrauchsspuren; Oberer Kapital ist gering berieben; Hinterdeckel ist gering fleckig; Schutzumschlag fehlt, oder es gibt keinen; * Die Photos sind original von uns erstellt worden, u.a. erkennbar an einem kleinen weißen Stück Papier im oberen Schnitt. Ab und an verwenden Suchmaschinen Verlagsphotos, bei den Portalen selbst, werden aber nur unsere Originalphotos gezeigt.

Paperback. Condition: As New. No Jacket. Pages are clean and are not marred by notes or folds of any kind. ~ ThriftBooks: Read More, Spend Less 0.97.

Hardcover. Condition: Good. 1st Edition. Hitler's Paper Weapon. By Wilhelm Hottl. Translated from German by Basil Creighton. Hard covers and in good condition. 1st Edition 1955. Scarce.

Hardback, 14x21cm, 187pp. Fair condition (general wear; knocked at head of spine; cocked spine; foxed page edges) in good dustwrapper (general wear, scuff marks, and faint stains; knocked at head of spine; faded spine; several 1-2cm tape bleed marks at spine).

Octavo, red heavy boards, silver gilt lettering to spine, 187pp, VG+ (light bruising to spine extrems, light tanning & foxing to page edges & eps) in d/w, VG (price clipped, moderate creasing & chipping to edges, moderate soiling, light fading to spine).

Condition: Very Good. First edition. Hardback. Slightly bumped corners and slight cock, light foxing to fore-edge, otherwise very good in a very good, slightly used, spotted and spine-faded, price-clipped dust jacket.

1st edition orig. cloth Nice Copy octavo 187pp., How the Nazis forged millions of British Banknotes. Author was an SD Officer and fully conversant with 'Operation Bernhard'. Scarce.
